version_description: Bug fixes

Notifications for game installation started and completed.
Games you’ve added to your list can be removed on the Playlist page.
Game installation status is available on the Playlist and game description page. Xbox must be configured to send installation status to the mobile app. Until then, you may see an error, however the game will download on your console.
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Squashed some bugs crawling around the app
Bug fixes

As a Game Pass member, you can view Game Pass quest details, track your quest progress and view Microsoft Rewards account balance. Not yet a Microsoft Rewards member? Sign up today to start earning rewards while playing games you love
Save time by viewing a list of games eligible for quests without needing to turn on your Xbox
Refresh the page by pulling down to get the latest information
We polished the app to make it shinier
Squashed some bugs crawling around the app
Bug fixes

Squashed some bugs crawling around the app
You can claim Rewards points for Game Pass quests in the app after completion of all punches
Faster start up time so you can discover games quicker than before
Squashed some bugs crawling around the app

We found bugs in the app... and we escorted them out.
Stay in the know with our new activity centre, now on Home.
New filters make it easier to find single-player, multiplayer, co-op and other games.
Get Xbox Game Pass Ultimate, which gives you access to games plus Xbox Live Gold.

Support your favorite streamer on Mixer by entering their creator code
Now we list the contents of each bundle so you know exactly what you're installing

Here's what's cool about this update.
Updates to quests for Xbox Insiders include:
New quest types
Improved viewing and browsing on the Home and Rewards tabs
View all the month's active and completed quests on a single page
Turn in multiple quests at once
Not an Insider? Your quest experience stays the same.
Bugs! We removed all the ones we knew about.
Bugs! We removed all the ones we knew about.
EA Play is coming soon for PC, and you can search for and install even more PC games once it arrives.
Called the exterminator and took care of those bugs.

We're making more improvements to the app so it's easier for you to discover and play your next favorite game!
Games now list supported languages on their details page, so you can easily see if a game supports your language of choice.
Days since new bugs found: 0
